# ddbj-utils

```
git clone git@github.com:tfuji/ddbj-utils.git && cd ddbj-utils

[tf@at043 ddbj-utils]$ bundle install

[tf@at043 ddbj-utils]$ bundle exec ruby biosample2ttl.rb test.xml
```
